title: Fireside with the Underboss - "My Sit Down With The Grim Reaper"
description: Sammy goes into detail about who Greg Scarpa Sr., also known as "The Grim Reaper" really was. One night, Greg reeks havoc in one of Sammy's clubs, so he immediately calls for a sitdown.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy goes into detail about who Greg Scarpa Sr., also known as "The Grim Reaper" really was. One night, Greg reeks havoc in one of Sammy's clubs, so he immediately calls for a sitdown.
